Hi all, I found this on bidders.com today, I am not usually keen on 
running these adds on lists and boards but this is pretty different.

http://www.bidders.co.jp/item/28217229

I'm curious to hear any thoughts and opinions on it. Is 2.5 Million Yen 
a high price.

Rich
